data.title: Gillian Welch & David Rawlings
data.meta_description: Gillian Welch and David Rawlings are coming to the Thomas Wolfe Auditorium at Harrah's Cherokee Center - Asheville on October 19, 2024.
data.text:
Prior to attending an event at our venue, please review our new venue policy for bags. Any bags/items that do not fit this criteria will not be permitted into the venue.

For information regarding events affected by COVID-19, please CLICK HERE.

If not, please continue through to the form below:

This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

You can report lost items by filling out the form below. In the ‘Description of items’ section, please include as much information about the item as possible, such as color and physical description. If an item is turned in that matches your item, you will be contacted to verify details of the item.

A form must be submitted online for all lost and found inquiries.

Unclaimed items will be discarded/donated 30 days after the date the item is turned in.

If your item is located, pickup will be arranged at our box office during normal business hours. You will be asked to present a valid photo ID for release of your item.
